title: Who were the Huguenots, and what happened to them? - Quora

response.answer_text: The Huguenots were the French Protestants. driven out of France by the very Catholic kings, they emigrated to non-Catholic countries, namely England, the Netherlands, Germany, North America. As they were recruited from the least hierarchical population, the simplest, austere and pragmatic, it was the most industrious part of France that left, which was catastrophic for the modernization of France.
